title: The Bureaucrat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose two players. The following day, they will have an anonymous additional vote against them.
- During the day, you may remove any anonymous votes you placed last night. You may queue this action to remove the vote if it would lead to the player being hanged.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Appears innocent
- All players are informed when a vote is removed during the day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

desc:
Post 4899
*You won't find these laws anywhere in the books, but you'll quickly find they exist.*
- The Personification of Corruption
